text: Septentrion is an album by Anodajay released on June 27, 2006 on his independently owned record label 7ième Ciel Records. The album is Anodajay's second studio album. "Le beat à Ti-Bi" won the Best French Video award at the Sounds of Blackness Awards in 2007. The same video was also a nominee for the Best French Video category at the MuchMusic Video Awards in 2007. ==Track listing== #"Septentrion (intro)" #"À quoi ça rime ?" #"Bonjour" (featuring Accrophone) #"Où sont les soldats ?" #"Une belle dame" #"Trop smooth" (featuring Boogat) #"Septimo (instrumental)" #"Intime au 7ième" #"My Man" #"Laissez-moi voler" #"Comme un pro" (featuring DJ Horg) #"Garde la tête haute" #"L'homme de bois" #"Tous nés pour mourir" (featuring Muzion) #"Désolé" #"Pars pas" #"Le beat à Ti-Bi" (featuring Raôul Duguay) ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Anodajay albums Category:2006 albums
title: Septentrion (album)
